item.title: My commands ain't working?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

I added:

			if (playerCommand.startsWith("ldshop") ) {
			if (c.isDonator == 1) {
			if (c.isDonator == 2) {
			if (c.isDonator == 3) {
				c.getShops().openShop(7);
				c.sendMessage("You open the low donator shop from mystical air!");
				} else {
				if(c.inWild() && c.isDonator == 0) {
				c.sendMessage("You can't do this command in the wilderness!");
			return;
				}
			}
			}
			}
			}
			if (playerCommand.startsWith("mdshop")) {
			if (c.isDonator == 2) {
			if (c.isDonator == 3) {
				c.getShops().openShop(8);
				c.sendMessage("You open the medium donator shop from mystical air!");
				} else {
				if(c.inWild() && c.isDonator == 0) {
					return;
				}
				}
			}
			}

			if (playerCommand.startsWith("hdshop") && c.isDonator == 3) {
				c.getShops().openShop(9);
				c.sendMessage("You open the high donator shop from mystical air!");
				} else {
				if(c.inWild() && c.isDonator == 0) {
				c.sendMessage("You can't do this command in the wilderness!");
			return;
				}
			}

No errors. I go in-game, my isDonator 3, and type all ldshop, mdshop, and hdshop, all not working. I donâ€™t get it :S.
